replies.body: when i was going to one of the OCE matches, there was a huge traffic jam affecting both lanes, suddenly i hear this ambulance roll up behind me, it turns onto the other side of the road and almost hits this car, i look in and theirs carbon still in his legacy uniform clutching on to the steering and on his face was pure anger, i finally get to the event and learnt that they had lost pretty badly. not his best day.
What exactly was the point of this lame-@ss troll "eye witness" post? You saw the guy IRL and he looked mad.....so....?
I can confirm this happening. Hope you get better soon carbon.
Great article Amelia, looking forward to reading your next contribution!
Awesome, article! really hope the new scene develops faster in this new structure. It's great to see weekly matches now as well!
